definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

Sun Yat-sen's Five-power constitution of Republic of China, then of Taiwan/The five courts or 院[yuan4] are 行政院[xing2 zheng4 yuan4] Executive yuan, 立法院[li4 fa3 yuan4] Legislative yuan, 司法院[si1 fa3 yuan4] Judicial yuan, 考試院|考试院[kao3 shi4 yuan4] Examination yuan, 監察院|监察院[jian1 cha2 yuan4] Control yuan
Guardian Council, body of 12 appointed clerics which governs Iran
pinyin: Xian4 fa3 Jian1 hu4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4

sentences.english: Constitution is the national fundamental law, with supreme status.
sentences.chinese: 憲法是國家的根本法，具有至高無上的地位。

sentences.english: The court is supposed to be the final arbiter of what is or isn't constitutional.
sentences.chinese: 對於是否合乎憲法，法院本來是最終的裁決者。

sentences.english: I think the U.S.Constitution is an advanced law.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得美國憲法是一部先進的憲法。

sentences.english: I think the U.S.Constitution is an advanced law.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得美國憲法是一部先進的憲法。

sentences.english: No organization or individual is privileged to be beyond the Constitution or the law.
sentences.chinese: 任何組織或者個人都不得有超越憲法和法律的特權。

sentences.english: In the run-up to the vote, the role of the United States and the international community became a subject of controversy.
sentences.chinese: 在決議新憲法草案前，美國與國際社會反應不一。

sentences.english: All acts in violation of the Constitution or the law must be investigated.
sentences.chinese: 一切違反憲法和法律的行爲，必須予以追究。

sentences.english: The Constitution must give citizens confidence that they will have control of their own destinies .
sentences.chinese: 憲法應給公民信心，他們有權掌握自己的命運。

sentences.english: In order to achieve this goal TheU.S. Constitution established the following two principles.
sentences.chinese: 爲了達到這一目的，美國憲法確立了以下兩條原則。

sentences.english: Part 5 describes the historical limitations of the Ideas of Five Powers Charter.
sentences.chinese: 此外，五權憲法思想還體現了樸素的民主集中制原則。

sentences.english: According to the constitution of the Wesfarmers, it could not convert to proprietary company.
sentences.chinese: 根據對西農的憲法，它不能轉換爲控股公司。

sentences.english: The first part discusses China's constitution in the non-public economic-related concepts.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分論述了我國非公經濟憲法地位變遷的過程。

sentences.english: and why do we make it so hard to amend our constitution.
sentences.chinese: 正是因此，我們修訂憲法纔會如此困難。

sentences.english: South Africa's constitution is remarkably pro-gay.
sentences.chinese: 南非憲法是非常贊成同性戀的。

sentences.english: The principle of legality was reiterated by the constitution of Claren.
sentences.chinese: 克拉林頓憲法重申了這一法制原則。

sentences.english: Is a new constitutional framework a pre-condition for taking part in elections?
sentences.chinese: 新的憲法架構是你們參加選舉的前提條件嗎？

definition: provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
to issue/to proclaim/to enact (laws, decrees etc)
norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
judgment (by a court of law)/to pass judgment on/to sentence
